questions.simple: What are the different types of cat coats and fur patterns
questions.simple_reference: Cats have various coat types and fur patterns. The main types include: Tabby (Mackerel, Classic/Blotched, Ticked, Spotted), Tortoiseshell and Calico (Tortie, Calico, Torbies), Bicolor (Tuxedo, Cow/Moo, Black Mask, Turkish Van), Solid Colors (Black, White, Blue, Chocolate, Cinnamon, Lilac), Smoke and Shaded (Smoke Cats, Shaded Cats), and Colorpoint (Siamese-Type Patterns with dark points on the ears, face, paws, and tail).
